description: two running fugures; man in front of woman; man carrying purse with cut strings; older woman holds whip in one hand and has hold of his hair with the other
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate in black: [LA PENNA E\' ZOPPA, MA PUR ELLA ARRIVA   3S/ G.M. Mitelli, .I.è.F./ Chi le voci del Ciel par che non senta,/ Sentirà ben dal Ciel scender la Pena/ Tanto rigida puì, quanto puì lenta,];  in pencil in plate: [2-76]
title: La Pena E' Zoppa, Ma Pur Ella Arriva
